content:
We just merged a big improvement to the top search bar typeahead driven by @Cory Lynch, which I've deployed here (if you see this in the next few minutes you may need to reload to get the new code).

I'd love it if a bunch of folks took the opportunity to play around with the new search typeahead, find anything that seems wrong, and open issues tagged with search, so we can fix them while things are still fresh.
Already have a couple improvements to what you see here, see #5401.
